name: How much does a life worth
name_original: How much does a life worth
description:
A 2D platformer game.

How much would you pay for a life?

Your mother needs a pill to save her life. You need to work hard within the time limit to save her.

Wealth will decrease over time. coins value is always static but they are heavy.

Be careful of thieves and take good use of making deals with other businessmen.
